Mr. Graydon Ausraus
- 2 -
March 26, 19^
Mr. Griffiths will continue to keep in close touch with you
on this and other matters of mutual concern to the National
Association of Educational Broadcasters and the Fund.
With all good wishes for l^he success of this new service in the
rapidly developing field of educational television and radio.
Sincerely yours.
Martha C. Howard
MCH gc
